text: Skoghalls IF was a sports club in Skoghall in Sweden. It was established in 1963. The club ran association football and bandy. The men's bandy team played in the Swedish top division in 1940, 1942, 1946 and 1947. The men's soccer team played seven seasons in the Swedish third division. The club merged with Vid√∂ns IK to form IFK Skoghall in 1963. == References == Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs
title: Skoghalls IF
